description:
My place is close to Intrepid Sea, Air & Space Museum, Totto Ramen, Empanada Mama, Kahve, and Pure Thai Cookhouse. You’ll love my place because of the location, the people, the ambiance, and the neighborhood. My place is good for couples, solo adventurers, business travelers, families (with kids), and big groups.

MY PLACE IS MORE SUITABLE FOR TOURISTIC VISITORS THAN BUSINESS (URL HIDDEN) IYS IN THE MIDDLE OF TOURISTIC ATTRACTIONS RESTAURANTS ETC THATS A SOCIAL NEIGHBORHOOD

2 bedroom and a living room very comfortable and useful clean appartment all furnitures are brand new.
Two queen size beds at each room each bed sleeps two adults total four.
Walkup second floor just couple stairs in a brickstone hell's kitchen building

Centrally located at Hell's Kitchen two blocks to times square
7 blocks 5 minutes walk to central park columbus circle main entrance
5-6 blocks to intrepid museum

All bars broadway shows restaurants are either on same street or around the corner on 9th ave

I live in the property

Guests has access for entire appartment everything during their stays

5G Wi fi
Cable Tv 
Kitchenware
Bathroom essentials(soup,shampoo etc)
Coffee ️ 
Room door lock
Living Room free use as common space includes tables chairs tv sofa etc.

24/7 I live in the appartment

Social
Safe
Fun
Friendly

Getting around is so easy
Everything is walking distance
Times square two blocks
Central park columbus circle main wntrance 5 mins walk 7 blocks

Broadway shows and restaurants are on your street

Intrepid museum couple blocks

You will feel like your own home while enjoying Charming Hell'S Kitchen and New York

Two queen size beds at each room each bed sleeps two adults total four.

I live in the living room.
name: Manhattan,New York,NY,United States
review: The host canceled this reservation 14 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.
